chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This chapter outlines procedures to deploy the &ceph; cluster. Currently we support the following methods of deployment:

important.title: Disable &aa;
important.para: Check whether the &aa; service is running and disable it on each cluster node. Start &yast; &aa; module, and select Settings and then deactivate the Enable Apparmor checkbox. Confirm with Done.
Note that &storage; will not work with &aa; enabled.

important.title: Do Not Mix Installation Methods
important.para: You cannot mix the supported installation methods. For example if you decide to deploy the cluster with &crow;, you cannot later make changes to its settings with ceph-deploy and vice versa.
